Package com.sri.common.net

Contains a set of classes which are common to all application types and are used for network communication.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SRISocketReader This is an interface used by SRISocket, which implements SRTP (Smart Robots Transfer Protocol), to return communication back to the object using the SRISocket.
 

Class Summary
DefaultSRISocketReader This provides a default implementation of the SRISocketReader interface.
SRISocket This class implements SRTP (Smart Robots Transfer Protocol).
 

Package com.sri.common.net Description

Contains a set of classes which are common to all application types and are used for network communication. Its main purpose is to provide functionality to abstract the SRTP protocol for use by applications written in Java.

Version:
1.5
Author:
Joseph Monti, Smart Robots
